trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with ABa Sainsburys Connect | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with ABa Sainsburys Connect | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use ABa Sainsburys Connect with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use ABa Sainsburys Connect with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Aba Sainsburys Connect.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Aba Sainsburys Connect.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: An Aba Sainsburys Connect single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: An Aba Sainsburys Connect single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Aba Sainsburys Connect will be able to single sign into the application at your Aba Sainsburys Connect company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Aba Sainsburys Connect will be able to single sign into the application at your Aba Sainsburys Connect company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Aba Sainsburys Connect
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Aba Sainsburys Connect

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Aba Sainsburys Connect.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Aba Sainsburys Connect.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Aba Sainsburys Connect.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Aba Sainsburys Connect.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Aba Sainsburys Connect</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Aba Sainsburys Connect</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Aba Sainsburys Connect, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Aba Sainsburys Connect, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Aba Sainsburys Connect</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Aba Sainsburys Connect</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Aba Sainsburys Connect with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Aba Sainsburys Connect with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Aba Sainsburys Connect application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Aba Sainsburys Connect application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Aba Sainsburys Connect page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Aba Sainsburys Connect page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App Settings page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App Settings page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App Settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App Settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Sign On URL textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign-on to your Aba Sainsburys Connect application (e.g.: https://myaba.co.uk/client-access/sainsburys/saml.php).
trans-unit.target: In the Sign On URL textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign-on to your Aba Sainsburys Connect application (e.g.: https://myaba.co.uk/client-access/sainsburys/saml.php).

trans-unit.source: Click Next
trans-unit.target: Click Next

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Aba Sainsburys Connect page, to download your metadata, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Aba Sainsburys Connect page, to download your metadata, click Download metadata, and then save the metadata file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Send the downloaded metadata file to your Aba Sainsburys Connect support team.
trans-unit.target: Send the downloaded metadata file to your Aba Sainsburys Connect support team.

trans-unit.source: Your Aba Sainsburys Connect support team has to do the actual SSO configuration.
trans-unit.target: Your Aba Sainsburys Connect support team has to do the actual SSO configuration.

trans-unit.source: You will get a notification when SSO has been enabled for your subscription.
trans-unit.target: You will get a notification when SSO has been enabled for your subscription.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Aba Sainsburys Connect, they must be provisioned into Aba Sainsburys Connect.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Aba Sainsburys Connect, they must be provisioned into Aba Sainsburys Connect.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Aba Sainsburys Connect, the user accounts need to be created by your Aba Sainsburys Connect support team.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Aba Sainsburys Connect, the user accounts need to be created by your Aba Sainsburys Connect support team.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Aba Sainsburys Connect user account creation tools or APIs provided by Aba Sainsburys Connect to provision Azure Active Directory user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Aba Sainsburys Connect user account creation tools or APIs provided by Aba Sainsburys Connect to provision Azure Active Directory user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Aba Sainsburys Connect **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Aba Sainsburys Connect **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
